title: Are Kayle, Jayce, and Gnar Melee or Ranged?
body:
Do these count as Melee or Ranged champions, for the World's Mission?

Gnar has Mega Gnar and can build Hydra (which only Melee champions can buy) but also Hurricane (which only Ranged champions can buy). Same with Kayle. And Jayce switches between a Ranged and a Melee form.

What about other champions? Every few seconds, Poppy has a Ranged auto-attack. Elise and Nidalee have different forms.

replies.body:
Yeah kayle is the only melee champ there. If you ever need to think whether a champ is melee or ranged, just think "At level 1, if I don't use any abilities is it a melee attack or ranged attack?"

The other way would be to just google "lol <champ name> wiki

I'd like to know the answer to this as well :)

Im confused about these champs becuase they can switch forms (Nid,Gnar,Jayce and Elise)

I think poppy is melee btw.

From what I understand, it would be based on their "initial" forms, and discounting any temporary buffs or on-hit effects. For Gnar, Elise and Nidalee, that would be ranged, while for Jayce, Kayle and Poppy, that would be melee.

https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-en/N5njyw7J-teamwork-close-combat-list-of-ranged-champions

Gnar Nidalee Elise Jayce are ranged. Poppy is too.
Kayle is melee apparently, makes no sense but hey thats the list talking.

Gnar is ranged most of the game, and Elise, NIdalee and Jayce can all switch freely between forms, however Kayle's range is essentially a buff that changes her classification for a few seconds. She isn't natively ranged which is why she isn't classed that way.

Also Poppy isn't ranged, she's melee, same deal as Kayle.
